Name: Relic Unbound
Desc:
[Enchant Force]
Completely unlock the relic's power to place an offensive relic. When Pathfinder's attack hits an enemy, the relic resonates to activate an attack that matches the pattern. Cannot be used if there is no relic pattern.
Discharge Enhancement
Places a relic that unleashes a flurry of arrows forward.
Blast Enhancement
Places a relic that fires arrows that explode on impact.
Transition Enhancement
Places multiple relics that attack all enemies within a set range.
